text: Ba'd az in zanon digar hec zane ʙar tu halol nest va on zanonero, ki ʙaroi tu halol kardem va niz digar zane ʙa coi onho ixtijor kardan halol nest, harcand turo az zeʙoii u xus ojad, magar on ci ʙa ƣanimat ʙa dasti tu aftad. Va Alloh nazoratkunandai har cizest va har korero ancom dihi, Alloh onro medonad
